title: Introducing globes. - Rev. ed.
creator_credit: John Lord and BFA Educational Media
brief_description: Animation and live-action are combined to explain many ways a globe can be used to help develop an understanding of the earth. Introduces concepts of latitude, longitude and rotation and notes the advantages of globes over flat maps. Suitable for lower and middle secondary levels.
